context: Education is the process of facilitating learning, or the acquisition of <a0_0><b3_0>knowledge, skills, values, beliefs, and habits<b3_0/><a0_0/>. Educational methods include <a1_0><b4_0>storytelling, discussion, teaching, training, and directed research<b4_0/><a1_0/>. Education frequently takes place under <a2_0>the <b5_0>guidance of educators<b5_0/><a2_0/>, but learners may also educate themselves. <b6_0><b7_0>Education<b7_0/><b6_0/> can take place in formal or informal settings and any experience that has a formative effect on the way one thinks, feels, or acts may be considered educational. The methodology of teaching is called pedagogy.
